description:
Item from the Rapid Estimate of Adult Literacy in Medicine (REALM-R), an 8-item instrument designed to rapidly screen patients for potential health literacy problems. [Bass PF 3rd, Wilson JF, Griffith CH. 2003 (PubMed ID: 14687263)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14687263/)

[Search for all realm variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=realm)
